message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.SI, cs.NE 

This paper proposes a new method for manifold learning, which is a subfield of machine learning. The paper focuses on enhancing local connection in dealing with data sparsity, which is a common issue in manifold learning. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.LG (Machine Learning), followed by cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.CV (Computer Vision) since manifold learning is widely used in these fields. Additionally, the paper also discusses the topological connection and reconstruction performance, which are related to cs.SI (Social and Information Networks) and cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing), respectively.
